sections.comments: If you are unable to register in the course, please send an e-mail to the instructor at isaacson@apsc.ubc.ca, indicating the reason that you are unable to register.  Please provide your student number, your program details (university, program name, year level), a copy of your transcript to date, an indication of how you have met course prerequisites, and a rationale for your need to take the course.

description: Time value of money; cash flow analysis; comparing options; depreciation, taxes, and inflation; financial accounting; company structures; public sector projects; decision-making.
